Description: Knowledge Economic City (known as: KEC) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since August 2010. KEC operates within the Real Estate sector focusing on Diversified Real Estate Activities. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia. KEC is based in Medina, Saudi Arabia and was established in August 2010.
